manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Smoothing Shampoo START HERE FOR A SMOOTH FINISH Reveal less frizzy, more manageable hair with Moroccanoil Smoothing Shampoo. It features nourishing argan oil, argan butter, and fermented yerba santa plant extract to smooth the cuticle, leaving hair silky and soft. It also contains safflower oil phospholipids to improve combability. Sulfate, phosphate, and paraben-free. How to Use Massage throughout wet hair and scalp. Rinse thoroughly. Benefits Smooths frizz and provides hydration

WHICH SHAMPOO IS RIGHT FOR YOU? Hydrating Add to your routine if your goal is hydrated hair with a healthier look and feel. Moisture Repair Add to your routine if your goal is to repair damaged hair and maintain a healthy moisture balance. Color Care Add to your routine if your goal is to protect against color fade and enhance vibrancy. Extra Volume Add to your routine if your goal is to boost volume, body, and shine.

Argan Oil Rich in antioxidants, vitamins and essential fatty acids, this rare and precious oil has been used for centuries to nourish hair and skin. About the Brand Moroccanoil began with the iconic Moroccanoil Treatment and now offers a full line of argan oil-infused hair and body products. Signature Scent Memorable and addictive, the signature Moroccanoil scent is an iconic juxtaposition of spicy amber and musk with sweet florals. Inspiring A Beautiful World Moroccanoil is committed to becoming a more sustainable brand and doing our part to protect the planet. We are certified as cruelty-free through PETA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This smells so nice and is very smoothing for thick hair
reviews.reviewText: I think it is over priced

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Leaves my hair soft and silky!
reviews.reviewText: I have naturally curly hair and use keratin treatments on it because of the amount of curl and rhe frizz. This shampoo and conditioner leave my hair super shiny, soft, and silky after drying and ironing, just like I walked out of the salon from having a treatment done! Wonderful products!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keratin treated hair
reviews.reviewText: I had a keratin done in May and here it is midAugust in DC. It’s hot and humid and my hair used to be a straight up hot mess until the keratin treatment. I ran out of the shampoo and conditioner bought at the salon when I had it done however I needed something that was relatively cheaper and had more product for my dollar. I found this on Amazon and I’m pretty glad I did. I just blew my hair dry and it took a little bit longer than usual as I like my hair stick straight vs the usual poofy wavy mess it’s used to being. Moroccan oil products are amazing, they smell good and they do an incredible job. This smoothing shampoo and conditioner so just that. There’s no sign of frizz yet and my hair feels lightweight. It’s not sticky or anything. I will continue to purchase this shampoo and conditioner as it has no sulfates which are harmful for a keratin treatment but this shampoo makes my hair feel better and smells so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT!! Moroccanoil Smoothing Shampoo, 33.8 oz
reviews.reviewText: I have ALWAYS loved Morroccanoil products. I've used them for over 15 years. Recently, my salon stopped carrying Morrocan Oil products. (They're a small shop, and the minimum order just became too large for them to stock. The loved the products.) When I saw the shampoo and conditioner on SALE for Amazon Prime Days 2021, for $14 off the usual price, I ordered BOTH the Smoothing Shampoo and Smoothing Conditioner. Normally I do not order this BIG 33.8 oz size, but the price was too good to pass up. AND now that I have them, I like the fact that they come with a PUMP on the top of the bottle. Easier in the shower than the flip top on the smaller bottles. I originally started using Morrocan Oil products at the recommendation of my stylist, beginning with the Moroccan OIL. (The photo is of MANY of my previous products.) I LOVE the scent!!! I have thick, wavy, dyed hair, and have sometimes used the Repair line, and sometimes the Moisturizing line. As I've aged, and since I live in the high arid desert, my hair gets "flyaway". The Smoothing line works for reducing that "static" in my hair. You won't go wrong with any of these products, and the scent is divine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Shampoo For Thick Hair!
reviews.reviewText: I have thick, wavy hair, somewhat frizzy. Everyone says how lucky I am to have all this hair but I think it's a pain in-the-you-know-what. It can be pretty voluminous and I like a more polished appearance. I don't like, however, spending an hour blow drying it out nor do I necessarily want sleek straight hair. And yes, it takes that long when you have a lot of thick, wavy hair. This shampoo and it's buddy - the smoothing conditioner, are great. It's worth the extra cost in my opinion. It calms the hair down and leaves it feeling very clean and healthy. I always get compliments on the way my hair smells. To be honest, I can't smell it on my hair but I believe them. I highly recommend the conditioner, too. I think the magic is in the pair. I also add some of the original Moroccan Oil while my hair is damp, and sometimes the brand's anti-frizz spray depending on the situation/weather. I air dry most of the time. I think using all these products together makes a huge difference. If you aren't happy with the shampoo, try the products together before you turn around. When I use the shampoo alone it's not as effective as when I also use the conditioner. Give it a try! Great seller - no issues and delivered quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is literally the best smelling shampoo ever but it also is the BESt I’ve ever ever had for my hair and my daughters’ its amazing you can feel it INSTANTLY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my hair soft and silky
It smells super good and softens my hair. My hair has been looking so pretty ever since I've used this.
Meu cabelo ficou muito ressecado , com este shampoo , mesmo fazendo hidratação depois , amo os produtos da marocanoil , porém o shampoo não atendeu as minhas expectativas
Desde el primer uso ya noto mi pelo mucho más suave y manejable.Tengo el pelo muy rizado y noto que es mucho más fácil peinármelo y me dura más el peinado sin frizz.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have nightmare hair. Naturally grey, coloured, wavy/ curly, prone to frizz. My usual products haven't been doing the job lately. I already use Morrocanoil curl cream, combined it with this shampoo and conditioner, hair is gradually feeling softer, shinier, and the curl is holding better. I am converted!

Deje de usar esta marca porque me parecía tan aleatoria su calidad, de repente parecía que se echaba a perder y olía muy mal. No sé si hayan mejorado los estándares de calidad O que al comprarlo aquí están garantizando que no se venda un producto que venga alterado. (Lo compraba en establecimientos con permisos de la marca).Lo que puedo decir ahora es que lleva semanas en mi baño y no ha cambiado el color y sigue oliendo muy bien. Antes de comprar cualquiera de estos es recomendable revisar el estado de tu pelo para que compres la mejor opción, yo solía comprar siempre el reparador solo porque mi pelo no me gustaba y lo que necesitaba era otro tipo de acondicionamiento. He comprado el shampoo, acondicionador, la crema, el control de puntas abiertas y el aceite y estoy fascinada, mi pelo me encanta y se siente muy bien!!
